mainBoard.flavorText: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." —Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

rulings.text: Cemetery Reaper grants +1/+1 to all other Zombie creatures you control, not just the ones its ability puts onto the battlefield.

The creature card in a graveyard is exiled as part of the activated ability’s effect, not as a cost. If that card has left the graveyard by the time the ability would resolve, the ability doesn’t resolve and you don’t get a Zombie token.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Phirax of Blood Ridge has sent a war giant at us? What, do I have to spell it out for you? Kill the giant, scoop out its skull, and drive it back to Blood Ridge. Honestly, what kind of necromancer minions are you?" —Keren-Dur, necromancer lord

foreignData.flavorText: „Phirax aus der Blutklamm hat einen kriegerischen Riesen gegen uns aufgehetzt? Muss ich das noch buchstabieren? Tötet den Riesen, höhlt seinen Schädel aus und schleudert ihn zurück in die Blutklamm. Also wirklich, welcher Nekromagier hat euch denn erschaffen?" —Keren-Dur, Nekromagier-Fürst
foreignData.name: Zombie-Goliath

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Phirax de Risco Sangriento envió un gigante guerrero contra nosotros? ¿Qué tengo que hacer, deletreártelo? Maten al gigante, sáquenle el cráneo y llévenlo de vuelta a Risco Sangriento. En serio, ¿qué clase de sirvientes nigrománticos son ustedes?" —Keren-Dur, señor nigromante
foreignData.name: Goliat zombie

foreignData.flavorText: « Phirax des Contreforts de Sang nous envoie un géant de guerre ? Faut-il vraiment que je vous explique tout ? Tuez le géant, évidez son crâne et reconduisez-le aux Contreforts. Vraiment, il n'y a plus de petit personnel, de nos jours ! » —Keren-Dur, seigneur nécromancien
foreignData.name: Goliath zombie

foreignData.flavorText: "Phirax di Crinale Sanguinario ci ha mandato contro un gigante della guerra? Beh, devo mettervelo per iscritto? Uccidete il gigante, vuotategli il teschio e rispeditelo a Crinale Sanguinario. Ma insomma, che razza di servitori necromanti siete?" —Keren-Dur, lord necromante
foreignData.name: Golia Zombie

foreignData.flavorText: 「血の峠のファイラックスが巨人兵を送り込んできたと？ で、何じゃ、説明せねばわからんのか？ 巨人を殺し、髑髏を取り出して、それで血の峠を襲い返してやるがよい。 まったく、何のための屍術士の下僕じゃ？」 ――屍術士の王、ケレン＝ドゥール
foreignData.name: ゾンビの大巨人
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・巨人

foreignData.flavorText: "Phirax das Montanhas Sanguíneas enviou um gigante guerreiro para nos atacar? E eu ainda tenho de lhes dizer o que fazer? foreignData.flavorText: «Фиракс Кровавого Хребта натравил на нас боевого гиганта? Мне что, надо вам все растолковывать, как детям? Прикончите гиганта, выскоблите его череп и отправьте труп обратно в горы. Честное слово, некудышные из вас прислужники некроманта!» — Керен-Дур, повелитель некромантов

mainBoard.name: Nightmare
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare’s power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.

mainBoard.name: Rise from the Grave
mainBoard.originalText: Put target creature card in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

rulings.text: Rise from the Grave doesn’t overwrite any previous colors or types. Rather, it adds another color and another subtype.
If the creature is normally colorless, it will simply become black. It can’t be both black and colorless.

A later effect that changes the affected creature’s colors will overwrite that part of Rise from the Grave’s effect; the creature will be only the new color. The same is true about an effect that changes the affected creature’s types or subtypes.

mainBoard.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

mainBoard.name: Consume Spirit
mainBoard.originalText:
Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

rulings.text: The amount of life you gain is equal to the number chosen for X, not the amount of damage Consume Spirit deals (in case some of it is prevented).
If the targeted permanent or player is an illegal target by the time Consume Spirit would resolve, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain any life.

foreignData.name: Lâmina da Destruição
foreignData.text: Destrua a criatura alvo que não seja preta.

foreignData.flavorText: Пустота не обладает твердостью, но режет словно сталь.
foreignData.name: Клинок Судьбы
foreignData.text: Уничтожьте целевое нечерное существо.

foreignData.flavorText: 虚空中无一物，却锐利似铁。
foreignData.name: 送终刀锋
foreignData.text: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。

mainBoard.name: Doom Blade
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mainBoard.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: If you want to destroy something lifeless, make it live.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn du etwas Lebloses zerstören willst, hauche ihm Leben ein.
foreignData.name: Naturalisieren
foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Si quieres destruir algo sin vida, haz que viva.
foreignData.name: Naturalizar
foreignData.text: Destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Pour détruire quelque chose qui ne vit pas, donnez-lui la vie.
foreignData.name: Naturalisation
foreignData.text: Détruisez l'artefact ciblé ou l'enchantement ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Se vuoi distruggere qualcosa di inanimato, dagli vita.
foreignData.name: Ritorno alla Natura
foreignData.text: Distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 命無き物を滅するには、生かしてやればよい。
foreignData.name: 帰化
foreignData.text: アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Se deseja destruir algo já morto, dê-lhe vida.
foreignData.name: Naturalizar
foreignData.text: Destrua o artefato ou encantamento alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Если хочешь уничтожить что-нибудь безжизненное, сначала сделай его живым.
foreignData.name: Приживание
foreignData.text: Уничтожьте целевой артефакт или чары.

foreignData.flavorText: 如果你想把无生命的东西打死，就先让它活起来。
foreignData.name: 回归自然
foreignData.text: 消灭目标神器或结界。

mainBoard.name: Naturalize
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mainBoard.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainBoard.flavorText: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Dunkelheit schickt nicht immer ihre Knechte aus, um die dreckige Arbeit zu machen.
foreignData.name: Ranken des Zerfalls
foreignData.text: Die Ranken des Zerfalls fügen einer Kreatur deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst X Lebenspunkte dazu, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Sümpfen ist, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: La oscuridad no siempre envía a sus sicarios a hacer el trabajo sucio.
foreignData.name: Zarcillos de corrupción
foreignData.text: Los Zarcillos de corrupción hacen X puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo y tú ganas X vidas, donde X es el número de pantanos que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: Les ténèbres n'envoient pas toujours leurs serviteurs faire leur sale besogne.
foreignData.name: Vrilles de corruption
foreignData.text: Les Vrilles de corruption infligent X blessures à une créature ciblée et vous gagnez X points de vie, X étant le nombre de marais que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: L'oscurità non manda sempre i suoi scherani a fare il lavoro sporco.
foreignData.name: Tentacoli della Corruzione
foreignData.text: I Tentacoli della Corruzione infliggono X danni a una creatura bersaglio e tu guadagni X punti vita, dove X è pari al numero di Paludi che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 闇が穢れた仕事を行うとき、送り込んでくるのは手先ばかりとは限らない。
foreignData.name: 堕落の触手
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。堕落の触手はそれにＸ点のダメージを与え、あなたはＸ点のライフを得る。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする沼の総数に等しい。

foreignData.flavorText: A escuridão nem sempre envia seus asseclas para fazer seu trabalho sujo.
foreignData.name: Gavinhas da Corrupção
foreignData.text: Gavinhas da Corrupção causa X pontos de dano à criatura alvo e você ganha X pontos de vida, sendo X igual ao número de Pântanos que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: Тьма не всегда посылает своих приспешников, чтобы выполнить грязную работу.
foreignData.name: Усики Гнили
foreignData.text: Усики Гнили наносят X повреждений целевому существу, и вы получаете X жизней, где X — количество Болот под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 黑暗势力不是每次都会派仆役来执行肮脏任务。
foreignData.name: 腐化卷须
foreignData.text: 腐化卷须对目标生物造成X点伤害且你获得X点生命，X为由你操控的沼泽之数量。

mainBoard.name: Tendrils of Corruption
mainBoard.originalText: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: The amount of life you gain is equal to the number of Swamps you control, not the amount of damage Tendrils of Corruption deals (in case some of it is prevented).
If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Tendrils of Corruption would resolve, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain any life.

mainBoard.text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: B

mainBoard.name: Forest
mainBoard.originalText: G

foreignData.name: Immerändernde Weite
foreignData.text: {T}, opfere die Immerändernde Weite: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einem Standardland und bringe es getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Expansión terramórfica
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrificar la Expansión terramórfica: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica y ponla en el campo de batalla girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignData.name: Immensité terramorphe
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifiez l'Immensité terramorphe : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.name: Distesa Terramorfica
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifica la Distesa Terramorfica: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base e mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignData.name: 広漠なる変幻地
foreignData.text: {T}, 広漠なる変幻地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地カードを１枚探し、それをタップ状態で戦場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.name: Vastidão Morfoterrena
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifique Vastidão Morfoterrena: Procure em seu grimório por um card de terreno básico e coloque-o virado no campo de batalha. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignData.name: Просторы Преображенных Земель
foreignData.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Просторы Преображенных Земель: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли и положите ее на поле битвы повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.name: 地塑旷野
foreignData.text: {T}，牺牲地塑旷野：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进战场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

mainBoard.name: Terramorphic Expanse
mainBoard.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mainBoard.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
